Chat Icon
/toggleicon You can toggle your own chat icon on / off with /toggleicon Keeping in mind that this will only affect you, as others will still be able to see your typing icon.
/resizeicon ## You can resize all icons with /resizeicon [new%] For example, /resizeicon 50 will make all icons 50% of normal size.
/seticonalpha ## You can edit the transparency of all icons with /seticonalpha [new%] For example, /seticonalpha 75 will make all chat icons 75% visible
